main.name: Colin Dale
main.bio: Hi there, I am Colin! My passion is working both with startups and larger businesses to help build & scale their companies. At the beginning of the pandemic, I started using Reactjs to build fully functional responsive web applications. I love learning and implementing new technologies that help me grow my skill set as a Developer. Currently I am a success caoch for Papa Fam where I help students learn to code using Reactjs along with some of my favorite technologies.

work.title: Arduino(CPP) micro-controller programmer/Low-voltage Electronics
work.description: Assisting in design process of building guitar junction-boxes. My role includes programming microcontrollers for the junction's pcbs, building cables and fulfilling online orders.

testimonials.text: Colin was able to deliver way ahead of schedule and ended up saving us money. Definitley would recomend his outfit to small businesses looking to level-up their online presence and sales.
testimonials.user: Todd Willow. Former owner of Foxpedal

testimonials.text: I have been learning Reactjs as a student and Colin has been a huge part of my learning to code.
